    • Method Detail

      • voteItem

        public void voteItem(int id,
            java.lang.String type)
              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                     SalesExceptions
        This method accepts a specific ID and then a type of voting procedure for an Item. If the type is not sent in correctly then this method will do nothing as the boolean typeCorrect will check if the type is indeed correct.
        Parameters:
        id - The specific database ID for an Item entry.
        type - Should either be 'Up' or 'Down' depending on how the user wants to vote for an item.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        SalesExceptions

      • deleteSpecificItem

        public void deleteSpecificItem(int id)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               SalesExceptions
        This method allows you to attempt to delete an item in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - - ID of a specific item in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        SalesExceptions
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        Item

      • changeItemStatus

        public void changeItemStatus(boolean status,
                    int id)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method allows a user to either approve or disapprove an Item.
        Parameters:
        status - True if the item is approved, false if item is un-approved or newly added.
        id - The ID of a specific Item in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        Item

      • insertNewItem

        public void insertNewItem(java.lang.String newTitle,
                 java.lang.String newUrl,
                 java.lang.String thumbUrl,
                 java.lang.String description)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          SalesExceptions
        This method allows a user to insert a new record into the database through this class rather than an interface or directly through the SQL database.
        Parameters:
        newTitle - - Title of Item
        newUrl - - Direct URL to Item
        thumbUrl - - Direct Image URL to Item
        description - - Simple description of Item
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        SalesExceptions
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        Item

      • generateApprovedItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> generateApprovedItems()
                                                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                       SalesExceptions
        This method returns a populated ArrayList of Items which contains many to one Item objects. The ArrayList will only contain Items which return true on Item.getApproved().
        Returns:
        ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        SalesExceptions
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        Items, Item

      • generateAllItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> generateAllItems()
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns a populated ArrayList of Items which contains many to one Item objects. This ArrayList will contain all items in the database. Should only be used for administration purposes such as selecting items to approve/disapprove.
        Returns:
        ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        Items, Item
